roleset.name: make popular
roleset.note: POPULARIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'popularize' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry other_cos 45.4. (from popularize.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: no instrument
example.text: It might be alleged that TV-1 has done more than its share *trace*-1 to popularize and promote non-violent civil disobedience, so the second situation hypothesized above would be simply a case of ``chickens coming home to roost.''

example.name: yes instrument
example.text: Wells Rich first popularized the Benson& Hedges brand more than 20 years ago with ads portraying, among other things, an elevator door closing on a passenger's cigarette.
example.arg: with ads portraying, among other things, an elevator door closing on a passenger's cigarette

example.name: all args
example.text: That teacher is popular among teenagers.

example.name: all args, negative polarity
example.text: Cloth diapers aren't popular with parents anymore.
